00003 #ifndef __ACQ200_DEBUG_H__
00004 #define __ACQ200_DEBUG_H__
00005 
00006 #define T(fmt, args...) printk(KERN_DEBUG "acq200_core:" fmt, ## args)
00007 #define E(fmt, args...) printk(KERN_NOTICE "acq200_core:" fmt, ## args)
00008 
00009 #define acq200_debug acq200_hostdrv_debug
00010 
00011 extern int acq200_debug;
00012 
00013 #define FN __FUNCTION__
00014 #define KE KERN_ERR
00015 #define KI KERN_INFO
00016 #define KW KERN_WARNING
00017 //#define KD KERN_DEBUG
00018 #define KD KI
00019 
00020 #ifndef LOCAL_DEBUG
00021 #define LOCAL_DEBUG 0
00022 #endif
00023 
00024 #define DBG_FIRED(lvl)  (acq200_debug>=(lvl) || LOCAL_DEBUG>=(lvl))
00025 
00026 #define dbg(lvl,format, arg...)                                         \
00027         do {                                                            \
00028                 if( DBG_FIRED(lvl) && printk_ratelimit())               \
00029                         printk (KD "%s: " format "\n", FN , ## arg);    \
00030         } while(0)
00031 
00032 #define err(format, arg...) printk(KE "ERROR:%s: " format "\n", FN , ## arg)
00033 #define info(format, arg...) printk(KI "%s: " format "\n", FN , ## arg)
00034 #define warn(format, arg...) printk(KW "%s: " format "\n", FN , ## arg)
00035 
00036 
00037 #ifdef CONFIG_KERNEL_ASSERTS
00038 /* kgdb stuff */
00039 #define assert(p) KERNEL_ASSERT(#p, p)
00040 #else
00041 #define assert(p) do {  \
00042         if (!(p)) {     \
00043                 printk(KERN_CRIT "BUG at %s:%d assert(%s)\n",   \
00044                        __FILE__, __LINE__, #p);                 \
00045                 BUG();  \
00046         }               \
00047 } while (0)
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 
00051 #define MARK printk(KERN_INFO "%s:%d %s MARK\n", \
00052              __FILE__, __LINE__, __FUNCTION__ )
00053 
00054 #define DMARK dbg(1, "%s:%d %s DMARK\n", __FILE__, __LINE__, __FUNCTION__ )
00055 
00056 #endif /* __ACQ200_DEBUG_H__ */
